text:
I recently built Lavo, a Pay-As-You-Go REST API that provides real-time access to LinkedIn profiles, company data, posts, and more. We all can use Linkedin data for many use cases, like lead generation, enriching a company etc.

Existing APIs often require monthly subscriptions, leading to wasted credits and MUCH higher costs. <https://lavodata.com>

Features:

* Real-time data access to LinkedIn profiles, company information, posts, and more.
* RESTful API for seamless integration with your applications.
* Scalable infrastructure to handle high-volume requests efficiently.
* Developer-friendly with comprehensive documentation and support.

Pricing Model:

* Pay-as-you-go: Purchase credits as needed, with no subscriptions.
* Volume discounts: Lower rates for higher credit purchases.
* Free trial: Start with 50 free credits to test the service.

I would love to hear your thoughts and feedback!
